thread.title: Nicki Minaj Joined by Beyonce for First Live Performance of 'Feeling Myself' at 'Tidal X'
thread.title_full: Nicki Minaj Joined by Beyonce for First Live Performance of 'Feeling Myself' at 'Tidal X'

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Nicki Minaj Joined by Beyonce for First Live Performance of 'Feeling Myself' at 'Tidal X'
text:
Comments The raptress and her collaborator finally performed the song live for the first time at the event taking place at the Barclays Center in Brooklyn on Tuesday, October 20. 
A bunch of stars performed during the "Tidal X" event which was held on Tuesday night, October 20 in New York. Nicki Minaj and Beyonce Knowles , however, managed to steal the spotlight when they appeared on the stage together to finally perform their latest collaboration "Feeling Myself" for the first time. Flaunting her curves in a black figure-hugging bodysuit, Nicki kicked off the performance by rapping her opening verse while busting out some choreographed moves with her dancers, who were also clad in all-black. Bey joined her later in the song. Taking the stage in a pink long-sleeved outfit, she repeatedly sang her "feeling myself" line along with her own dancers. Fans were obsessed over the two ladies' energetic performance. They gave it rave reviews on Twitter. "This performance was everything and anything this world will ever need," said one user. "That iconic moment when these two women snatched hundreds of weaves at the same time: #BeyNika #TIDALX1020," another added. Launched to celebrate Tidal's 1 million subscribers, the "Tidal X" concert took place at the Barclays Center in Brooklyn and was live streamed on the service. Bey and Nicki both served as headliners alongside Jay-Z and Nick Jonas . Other performers included Rick Ross , Usher , T.I. and Lil Wayne .
